title: Unrepentant

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, you may become any Unseen role that derives from a Countryfolk role, replacing your attributes and abilities with those of the new role. You keep your background.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Retain your Background upon being converted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.

desc:
Post 4702
*The things I learned in prison will be handy soon.*
